item.title: igi
item.description:
This script generates an issue file that is shown when you log in to your computer without a DM. It applies the current color scheme that you have set in .Xresources
dependencies toilet display ASCII artish fonts lolcat rainbow color effect on terminal output fortune prints a random fortune The script has a sudo mv command, which requires you to enter a password.

item.title: subact
item.description: This is a script I wrote to automate the process of uploading scripts and dotfiles to this web site. It analyzes the title of Sublime Text to get the filename of the currently open file. If the file is in ~/bin (my local scripfolder), it is a scriptfile, else it is a dotfile. Depending on the type it is sent to different directories within my hugo project folder. Which is on my Dropbox.
